#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define FL(a) memset(a, 0, sizeof a);
#define pi(a) cout <<  a << endl;
#define si(n) scanf("%d",&n)
#define pis(n) printf("%d ",n);
#define FREP(b) for(int i=0;i<b;i++)
#define REP(a,b,c) for(int a=b;a<c;a++)
typedef pair<int,int> ii;
typedef long long LL;
/*
struct data{
};
bool operator < (const data &a1, const data &a2){
}
*/
vector<int> G[20008];
int visited[20008], p[20008];
int dfs(int v){
    FREP(G[v].size()){
        if(!visited[G[v][i]]){
            p[G[v][i]] = v;
            visited[G[v][i]] = 1;
            dfs(G[v][i]);
        }
    }
}
int main()
{
    int n, hq1, hq2;
    int tc;
    si(tc);
    while(tc--){
        memset(visited, 0, sizeof visited);
        cin >> n >> hq1 >> hq2;
        REP(j,1,n+1){
            G[j].clear();
        }
        int a;
        REP(j,1,n+1){
            if(j == hq1) continue;
            si(a);
            G[a].push_back(j); G[j].push_back(a);
        }
        visited[hq2] = 1;
        dfs(hq2);
        REP(j,1,n+1){
            if(j == hq2) continue;
            cout << p[j] << " ";
        }
        cout << endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
